title: Create a Work Package
description: A construction manager is breaking down a large part of the project into a smaller, manageable work package to be issued to a field supervisor.

tasks.description: Define the scope of the work package (e.g., 'Installation of underground piping on Area 5').
tasks.expected_outcome: The manager clearly defines the boundaries of the work.

tasks.description: Compile all the necessary documents for the package, including drawings, safety procedures, and quality forms.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent gathers all the required documentation.

tasks.description: Create the work package in the system and issue it to the field supervisor.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates the formal work package and assigns it to the supervisor.
